job description:
• *Danaher Company Description**
X-Rite is the global leader in color measurement and color management, offering hardware, software and services for measuring, formulating and matching color. The company serves a range of industries, including automotive, paints, plastics, textiles, printing, packaging, photography, graphic design, video, and medical. X-Rite serves customers worldwide from its offices in Europe, Asia and the Americas.
  • *Description**
We are looking for a SENIOR RESEARCHER / ENGINEER working in the field of COLOR SCIENCE to round out our software team in our Tewksbury, MA office.

In addition to other duties, this position will be primarily responsible for:
  • Develop and write C Algorithms for the Color industry.
  • Research, identify, explore and prove feasibility of new technology.
  • Develop patent and work with IP lawyers
  • Conduct applied and fundamental research on the relationship of color science and provide findings to internal/external customers.
  • Adapt and transfer new technology for optimization and commercialization.
  • Generate and collaborate creating Patent ideas.
  • Develop specifications, estimate project cost and time, release and support applications.
  • Work with cross-functional teams to explore new color technology
  • Work in an international environment.
  • *Qualification**
  • A MS/PHD in engineering field
  • Strong proficiency in C/C , with thorough knowledge of the standard library, STL containers and algorithms.
  • Hands-on experience in the field of color science. (such as color conversion, ICC profiles, formulation, image processing, 3d rendering and good understanding of color processes).
  • Strong mathematical and statistics background
  • Solid foundation in Object Oriented Programming and Development (i.e polymorphism, inheritance, ?).
  • Strong understanding of Design Patterns.
  • Advanced software engineering concepts. (Threading, Multiprocessing, Advanced Data Structures).
  • Comfortable with Matlab/Mathematica.
  • Comfortable with the following Principals: Optics, Statistics, GPU, linear algebra.
  • Solid understanding of Agile methodology such as Scrum. Certified Scrum Master is a plus.
  • Familiarity with Unit testing and continuous integration.
  • Capable to work in a team
  • Great learning capabilities and problem solving skills
  • Active participation with ICC is a plus
  • Fast learner with the ability to learn and adapt to new technology
  • Good communication skills
  • Ability to perform the above mentioned job functions
